longTitle.name: longTitle
longTitle.content: To authorize the grant of increases in widows and orphans pensions.

section.name: s1
section.heading: Short title
section.content: This Ordinance may be cited as the Widows and Orphans Pension (Increase) Ordinance.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Interpretation
section.leadIn: In this Ordinance, unless the context otherwise requires—
section.def: increase in pension (撫恤金增加額) means an increase in the pension under this Ordinance;
pension (撫恤金) means a pension payable under the Widows and Orphans Pension Ordinance (Cap. 94) to a widow or orphan of an officer.

subsection.content: A pension may, in any period ending not later than the date from which the first increase under subsection (2) becomes effective, be increased in accordance with one or more paragraphs of the Schedule as are applicable in any particular case. (Amended 3 of 1993 s. 54)

If, in any year after 1992 (the succeeding year), the average monthly Consumer Price Index (A) of the period of 12 months beginning on 1 April of the previous year and ending on 31 March of the succeeding year, exceeds the average monthly Consumer Price Index (A) of the 12 months immediately preceding that first-mentioned period by an amount which when expressed as a percentage exceeds 0.1%, the pensions described in subsection (4) shall be increased by a percentage equal to the excess expressed as a percentage with effect from the date specified under subsection (3)(a) in respect of such increase. (Added 3 of 1993 s. 54)

subsection.leadIn: Where, pursuant to subsection (2), any pension becomes subject to an increase, the Chief Executive shall, as soon as practicable, by notice published in the Gazette* specify— (Amended 63 of 1999 s. 3)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the date, which shall not be later than the date of the notice, from which such increase shall be effective; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the percentage of the increase as determined in accordance with subsection (2). (Added 3 of 1993 s. 54)

subsection.leadIn: The pensions referred to in subsection (2) are—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: in the case of the first increase under that subsection—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: any pension calculated on the total contributions up to 31 March 1992 together with the total increases in pension; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: any pension calculated on the contributions from 1 April 1992,

paragraph.continued: up to the date immediately preceding the specified date of such first increase; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: in the case of any subsequent increase under subsection (2)—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: any pension calculated on the contributions up to the date immediately preceding the specified date of the last increase under that subsection together with the total increases in pension; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: any pension calculated on the contributions from the specified date of the last increase under that subsection,

paragraph.continued: up to the date immediately preceding the specified date of such subsequent increase. (Added 3 of 1993 s. 54)

subsection.def: In subsection (4) specified date (指定日期), in relation to an increase under subsection (2), means the date specified under subsection (3)(a) as the date from which that increase shall be effective. (Added 3 of 1993 s. 54)

section.name: s4
section.heading: Increases in pension to be paid from general revenue
